channel.title: Posts on Nathan's New Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nathan's New Site

item.title: First Post
item.description: It seems worthwhile to create a website. There have been a few before this including blogger and wordpress. There’s still a travel one, mostly filled with draft posts. I should get around to updating that sometime. In the mean time, here’s another start. I’ve got some ideas about what I want to write about: How much space is dedicated to cars in Auckland, specifically around transit stations. The weirdness of setting up a blog.
